title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 07, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 07, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Web Frameworks

*   [Don (⭐54)](https://github.com/abemedia/go-don) - A highly performant and simple to use API framework.
items.content_html:
Web Frameworks

  • Don (⭐54) - A highly performant and simple to use API framework.

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes
items.content_text:
### Action

*   [re3](https://github.com/halpz/re3) - Reversed source code for GTA III and GTA: Vice City.
items.content_html:
Action

  • re3 - Reversed source code for GTA III and GTA: Vice City.

items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:
### Monetization / Other

*   [Zesty Market](https://www.zesty.market) - A marketplace for rentable banner spaces in XR. Offers integrations with most major WebXR creation tools.

### Social Spaces / Other

*   [Dreamwave](https://dreamwave.tech/) - A web-based platform for hosting scalable virtual events. Powered the virtual music festival Secret Sky 2021.

### Web3XR / Realms

*   [Voxels](https://www.voxels.com/) - A virtual world powered by Ethereum where players can buy land, build stores, display art, and more.
*   [Ozone Metaverse](https://ozonemetaverse.io/) - A spatial computing cloud platform offering world creation tools with Web3 integrations and monetization.
items.content_html:
Monetization / Other

  • Zesty Market - A marketplace for rentable banner spaces in XR. Offers integrations with most major WebXR creation tools.

Social Spaces / Other

  • Dreamwave - A web-based platform for hosting scalable virtual events. Powered the virtual music festival Secret Sky 2021.

Web3XR / Realms

  • Voxels - A virtual world powered by Ethereum where players can buy land, build stores, display art, and more.
  • Ozone Metaverse - A spatial computing cloud platform offering world creation tools with Web3 integrations and monetization.

items.title: Awesome Shell
items.content_text:
### Multimedia and File Formats / Directory Navigation

*   [jc (⭐8.3k)](https://github.com/kellyjonbrazil/jc) - Convert command output, file-types, and common strings to JSON or YAML for easier use in scripts.
items.content_html:
Multimedia and File Formats / Directory Navigation

  • jc (⭐8.3k) - Convert command output, file-types, and common strings to JSON or YAML for easier use in scripts.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Others

*   [BlazorSSR (⭐7)](https://github.com/danroth27/BlazorSSR) - ![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/danroth27/BlazorSSR?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=604800) ![last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/danroth27/BlazorSSR?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=86400) Server-side rendering (SSR) with Blazor components, by Steve Sanderson.

### Articles / Others

*   [8 Free and Open Source Blazor UI Libraries](https://www.claudiobernasconi.ch/2023/05/25/8-free-and-open-source-blazor-ui-libraries) - May 25, 2023 - List of available free and open-source user interface libraries for Blazor development.
items.content_html:
Others

  • BlazorSSR (⭐7) - Server-side rendering (SSR) with Blazor components, by Steve Sanderson.

Articles / Others

  • 8 Free and Open Source Blazor UI Libraries - May 25, 2023 - List of available free and open-source user interface libraries for Blazor development.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Menu Bar Tools

*   [TextSniper](https://textsniper.app/) - Simple yet powerful OCR app in your Menu Bar. Instantly copy and paste text from anywhere. [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/app/id1528890965)
items.content_html:
Utilities / Menu Bar Tools

  • TextSniper - Simple yet powerful OCR app in your Menu Bar. Instantly copy and paste text from anywhere.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Authentication & Identity

*   [Corbado](https://corbado.com) - Passkey-first authentication as a service.
items.content_html:
Authentication & Identity

  • Corbado - Passkey-first authentication as a service.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

*   [vite-plugin-css-export (⭐29)](https://github.com/shixuanhong/vite-plugin-css-export) - Export variables from CSS to JavaScript, and support nested rules.
*   [vite-plugin-generate-html (⭐8)](https://github.com/gedouu/vite-plugin-generate-html) - Define separate output files for JavaScript and CSS bundles.
items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

  • vite-plugin-css-export (⭐29) - Export variables from CSS to JavaScript, and support nested rules.
  • vite-plugin-generate-html (⭐8) - Define separate output files for JavaScript and CSS bundles.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Code Generation / SRAM

*   [micropython-stubber (⭐227)](https://github.com/Josverl/micropython-stubber) - Generate and use stubs for different MicroPython firmwares to use with Visual Studio Code or any IDE and linter.
items.content_html:
Code Generation / SRAM

  • micropython-stubber (⭐227) - Generate and use stubs for different MicroPython firmwares to use with Visual Studio Code or any IDE and linter.

items.title: Awesome Vala
items.content_text:
### Apps / Productivity

*   [Annotator (⭐253)](https://github.com/phase1geo/Annotator) - Annotate images for better communication.
*   [Minder (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/phase1geo/Minder) - Mind-mapping application.
*   [Outliner (⭐62)](https://github.com/phase1geo/Outliner) - Write outlines easily.
*   [TextShine (⭐20)](https://github.com/phase1geo/TextShine) - Convert and manipulate text.
items.content_html:
Apps / Productivity

  • Annotator (⭐253) - Annotate images for better communication.
  • Minder (⭐1.1k) - Mind-mapping application.
  • Outliner (⭐62) - Write outlines easily.
  • TextShine (⭐20) - Convert and manipulate text.

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Domain and IP Research / GitHub

*   [WebsiteTechMiner.py (⭐9)](https://github.com/cybersader/WebsiteTechMiner-py) - automates gathering website profiling data into a CSV from the "BuiltWith" or "Wappalyzer" API for tech stack information, technographic data, website reports, website tech lookups, website architecture lookups, etc.

### Image Search / GitHub

*   [Baidu Images](https://image.baidu.com)
*   [Bing Images](https://www.bing.com/images)
*   [Clarify](https://clarify.io)
*   [Flickr](https://flickr.com/search/)
*   [Lycos Image Search](https://search.lycos.com)
*   [PhotoBucket](https://photobucket.com)
*   [PicTriev](http://www.pictriev.com) - a face search engine.
items.content_html:
Domain and IP Research / GitHub

  • WebsiteTechMiner.py (⭐9) - automates gathering website profiling data into a CSV from the "BuiltWith" or "Wappalyzer" API for tech stack information, technographic data, website reports, website tech lookups, website architecture lookups, etc.

Image Search / GitHub

  • Baidu Images
  • Bing Images
  • Clarify
  • Flickr
  • Lycos Image Search
  • PhotoBucket
  • PicTriev - a face search engine.

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### Item Resource Files

*   [Sitecore Item as Resource Explorer (⭐4)](https://github.com/GAAOPS/Sitecore.Protobuf.Browser) - WPF application which allows you to browse the Sitecore static databases files (.dat)
items.content_html:
Item Resource Files

  • Sitecore Item as Resource Explorer (⭐4) - WPF application which allows you to browse the Sitecore static databases files (.dat)
